description: This file defines two CMake functions, 'json_string_to_cmake' and 'json_string_ref_to_cmake', for processing JSON-encoded strings, including unescaping sequences and converting JSON string representations to CMake-compatible strings.

methods.name: json_string_to_cmake
methods.description: Converts a JSON string literal into a CMake string by removing quotes and unescaping sequences.

methods.name: json_string_ref_to_cmake
methods.description: References a variable containing a JSON string and converts it into a CMake string.
